pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland.

Prime Minister Trudeau offered his condolences for the innocent victims who were killed or injured on March 22 as a result of the attack in London, United Kingdom.  Prime Minister Trudeau also offered Canadaâ€™s full support to the United Kingdom.  

The two leaders agreed to continue cooperation to counter the threat of terrorism and radicalization.
